description.value:
Aura 20

Any enemy that starts its turn within the aura is pulled a number of squares depending on Allabar's current hit points: 776 to 1,100, 1 square; 551 to 775, 2 squares; 226 to 550, 4 squares; 1 to 225, 8 squares.
Enemies can't gain combat advantage by flanking Allabar.
Whenever Allabar is bloodied, it gains an extra standard action during each turn, even if it is dazed.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Attack: Melee 4 (one creature)

+35 vs. AC

Hit: 3d8 + 15 damage, and the target is restrained until the end of Allabar's next turn.

At-Will

Standard

Effect: Allabar uses tentacle three times, making each attack against a different target.

At-Will

Standard

Attack: Close burst 1 (enemies in the burst at 0 hit points or fewer)

+33 vs. Fortitude

Hit: Allabar pulls the target into its space, the target dies, and psionic boost recharges.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ psychic

Standard

Attack: Close blast 5 (enemies in the blast)

+33 vs. Fortitude

Hit: 4d10 + 25 psychic damage, and the target sprouts a hostile tentacle (save ends). While the target is affected by the hostile tentacle, any ally of the target that ends its turn within 2 squares of the target takes 20 damage.

Recharge when no enemy is affected by this power

Minor

Attack: Melee 4 (one creature)

+33 vs. Fortitude

Hit: Ongoing 20 damage (save ends).

First Failed Saving Throw: The ongoing damage increases to 25.

Second Failed Saving Throw: The target is also weakened and insubstantial (save ends all).

Third Failed Saving Throw: The target drops to 0 hit points unless it is already below 0 hit points.

system.rechargeCondition: when no enemy is affected by this power

description.value:
Recharge when Allabar takes psychic damage ✦ psychic

Triggered

Trigger: Allabar hits with tentacle.

Effect (Free Action): The attack deals 4d10 extra psychic damage.

At-Will

Triggered

Trigger: An enemy damages Allabar.

Effect (Immediate Reaction): The triggering enemy is dazed (save ends).

AC 45Fort 43Ref 41Will 43
Speed 6, fly 6 (hover)
Ability ScoresStr 30 (+25)

Cha 28 (+24)

Alignment evil

Passive Perception 35 | Insight 35
